text: cloud computing is highly relevant for
public sector business across the world
this is the reason why we are inviting
more builders to join us
[Music]
hi my name is elin i'm with amazon web
services talent acquisition team
i lead the talent acquisition team for
public sector business across southeast
asia candidates generally have to go
through up to eight rounds of interview
and the interview process can generally
be split into three stages
the first stage will be more of a
functional screen where candidates will
have to talk about their functional
skills
competencies their achievements that
they can bring to the table stage two
might not be applicable to all
candidates for some candidates they will
be required to go through business case
presentation or whiteboard session to
further demonstrate their skills
and deep dive into customer domain and
technical skills the financial interview
will comprise of five to six rounds of
one-on-one sessions with stakeholders
with the people who are going to work
with in the business
it is possible for candidates go through
multiple roles and multiple interviews
at the same time
however when they go to the final
financial interview they will need to
commit to one
i would recommend candidates to come
prepared for the interviews it is
critical for candidates to be able to
come up with examples to share with the
interviewers that will demonstrate the
value of the leadership interval
there are 40 leadership principles here
at amazon it is in our dna and it guides
both
our business and hiring decisions my
recommendation to candidates will be to
use the star interview methodology
in their response aws is a great place
to work in
it is fun and very diverse and all of us
have a common goal of customer obsession
in mind
come build the future with aws
